name: Diverse Technology Solutions
tag_list: cloud-computing, managed-it-services, technology-consulting, virtualization--server-consolidation, storage-area-networks, enterprise-messaging-solutions, disaster-prevention, network-audits, data-center-construction-relocation, network-security-solutions
overview:
Comprehensive solutions to keep your business network up and running.Cloud Computing, Managed IT Services, and Technology Consulting for Small and Mid-sized Businesses.

Cloud Computing Services

Diverse Technology Solutions (DTS) makes it simple … and cost-effective. We offer small and midsized businesses a full range of reliable, scalable and secure public and private cloud computing, hosting and consulting services. DTS provides the infrastructure, the technology talent and the unwavering customer service commitment to help maximize network uptime so you can spend more time growing your business.

Managed IT Services

At Diverse Technology Solutions (DTS), we bring best-in-class managed IT services to small and midsized companies like yours so you can focus on building your business, not managing your computer network.

Technology Consulting

Your technology systems are the tools your business depends on. To keep them up and running, depend on the technology consulting expertise of Diverse Technology Solutions (DTS), a leader in providing integrated IT support and management solutions to small and mid-sized businesses for more than a decade.
